mapper.select: SELECT "oneToOneBoard"."oBoardId" AS "boardId" ,"chat"."chatId" ,"oneToOneBoard"."oTitle" ,"customer"."customerName" ,"oneToOneBoard"."address" || ' ' || "oneToOneBoard"."addressDetail" AS "address" ,TO_CHAR("oneToOneBoard"."finishTime", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "finishTime" , CASE WHEN "oneToOneBoard"."oPostingMinutes" = 0 THEN 'D-day 0' ELSE 'D-' || FLOOR("oneToOneBoard"."oPostingMinutes" / 1440) END AS "day" ,TO_CHAR("message"."sendTime", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "sendTime" ,"oBoardImage"."oBoardImagePath" AS "path" ,"message"."messageContent" FROM "oneToOneBoard" INNER JOIN "chat" ON "oneToOneBoard"."oBoardId" = "chat"."oBoardId" INNER JOIN "customer" ON "chat"."customerId" = "customer"."customerId" LEFT JOIN "oBoardImage" ON "oneToOneBoard"."oBoardId" = "oBoardImage"."oBoardId" LEFT JOIN ( SELECT "chatId" ,"messageContent" ,"sendTime" ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY "chatId" ORDER BY "sendTime" DESC) AS "rowNum" FROM "message" ) "message" ON "chat"."chatId" = "message"."chatId" AND "message"."rowNum" = 1 WHERE "oneToOneBoard"."oAuthorId" = cast(#{oAuthorId} as uuid)

SELECT "chat"."chatId" ,"message"."senderId" ,"message"."messageContent" ,TO_CHAR("message"."sendTime", 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS sendTime ,"customer"."customerName" FROM "chat" INNER JOIN "message" ON "chat"."chatId" = "message"."chatId" INNER JOIN "customer" ON "message"."senderId" = "customer"."customerId" WHERE "chat"."chatId" = cast(#{chatId} AS uuid) ORDER BY "message"."sendTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "chat"( "chatId" ,"customerId" ,"oBoardId" ) VALUES ( cast(#{chatId} AS uuid) ,cast(#{customerId} AS uuid) ,cast(#{boardId} AS uuid) )

INSERT INTO "message"( "messageId" ,"chatId" ,"senderId" ,"sendTime" ,"messageContent" ) VALUES ( cast(#{messageId} AS uuid) ,cast(#{chatId} AS uuid) ,cast(#{senderId} AS uuid) ,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,#{messageContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT "chat"."chatId" ,"oneToOneBoard"."address" || ' ' || "oneToOneBoard"."addressDetail" AS "address" ,"oneToOneBoard"."oTitle" AS "title" ,"oBoardImage"."oBoardImagePath" AS "path" ,"customer"."customerName" FROM "chat" INNER JOIN "oneToOneBoard" ON "chat"."oBoardId" = "oneToOneBoard"."oBoardId" INNER JOIN "customer" ON "oneToOneBoard"."oAuthorId" = "customer"."customerId" LEFT JOIN "oBoardImage" ON "oneToOneBoard"."oBoardId" = "oBoardImage"."oBoardId" WHERE "chat"."chatId" = cast(#{chatId} AS uuid)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM "chat" WHERE "chat"."chatId" = cast(#{chatId} AS uuid)
